<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">[Stone Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=1057)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Attack" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=15" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 201 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You conjure a jagged lance of stone and then launch it at a foe. Make a spell attack roll against the target. On a hit, you deal 6d6 piercing damage and the lance impales the creature, giving it a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds unless it [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=79). On a critical hit, if the creature is on the ground, the lance also embeds into the ground and [immobilizes](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) the creature until it Escapes. A creature that Escapes after being impaled takes 3 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). When the spell ends, the lance crumbles into dirt, freeing the target if it hasn't Escaped.

---
**Heightened (+1)** Increase the damage by 2d6 and the persistent bleed damage for Escapes by 1.
name: Stone Lance
